name: OpenVDB 12.1.1
body:
This is a patch release to fix a performance regression in OpenVDB AX, and a build issue with Houdini 21.X.

See the [release notes](https://www.openvdb.org/documentation/doxygen/changes.html#v12_1_1_changes) for more details.

name: OpenVDB 12.1.0
body:
Highlights from this release:

 - New tools to construct level sets, including `tools::createLevelSetCapsule`, `tools::createLevelSetTaperedCapsule`, `tools::createLevelSetTubeComplex` and `tools::createLevelSetDilatedMesh`.
 - New `points::pca` tool to perform principal component analysis on point distributions.
 - New and improved `point::rasterizeSdf` surfacing tools, including anisotropic surfacing operators.
 - Significantly improved the performance of LeafNode ValueIterators and delay-loaded file reads.
 - Added support for LLVM 16+ for OpenVDB AX.

See the [release notes](https://www.openvdb.org/documentation/doxygen/changes.html#v12_1_0_changes) for more details.

name: OpenVDB 12.0.1
body: See the [release notes](https://www.openvdb.org/documentation/doxygen/changes.html#v12_0_1_changes) for more details.

name: fvdb_v0.2.1
body:
## What's Changed
* [Fix bug where image cropping wasn't working in Gaussian Splatting](https://github.com/NVIDIA-Omniverse/openvdb/commit/a8e52da53cc3d1b8eee0c4e20637fdecdd28d1e3)
* Environment definition files moved to using `conda-forge` channel from `pytorch`, `nvidia` channels
* Added cmake infrastructure for unit tests
* `setup.py` fixes for missing modules and issues when cudnn download is interrupted
* Small quality-of-life improvements to 3dgs code

name: OpenVDB 12.0.0
body: See the [release notes](https://www.openvdb.org/documentation/doxygen/changes.html#v12_0_0_changes) for more details.

name: OpenVDB 11.0.0
body: "See the [release notes](https://www.openvdb.org/documentation/doxygen/changes.html#v11_0_0_changes) for more details."

name: OpenVDB 10.1.0
body:
Highlights from this release:
- OpenVDB Python bindings are now implemented using pybind11 instead of Boost.Python. [Contributed by Matthew Cong]

See the [release notes](https://www.openvdb.org/documentation/doxygen/changes.html#v10_1_0_changes) for more details.

name: OpenVDB 10.0.1
body:
This is a patch release to fix an issue with VolumeToMesh.

See the [release notes](https://www.openvdb.org/documentation/doxygen/changes.html#v10_0_1_changes) for more details.

name: OpenVDB 10.0.0
body:
Highlights of the release:

- Introducing [OpenVDBLink](https://github.com/AcademySoftwareFoundation/openvdb/tree/master/openvdb_wolfram/OpenVDBLink), which provides a [Mathematica](https://www.wolfram.com/mathematica/) interface to [OpenVDB](https://openvdb.org/).

- Introducing a new command line tool, dubbed [vdb_tool](https://github.com/AcademySoftwareFoundation/openvdb/tree/master/openvdb_cmd/vdb_tool), that can combine any number of the high-level tools available in [openvdb/tools](https://github.com/AcademySoftwareFoundation/openvdb/tree/master/openvdb/openvdb/tools).

See the [release notes](https://www.openvdb.org/documentation/doxygen/changes.html#v10_0_0_changes) for more details.

name: OpenVDB 9.1.0
body:
Highlights of the release:

- Added multiple new rasterization methods for particle to volume operations to generate both surfaces and fog volumes. 
- OpenVDB AX support on Windows.
- Added support for AMD's HIP API in NanoVDB.
- Various other bug fixes, improvements and new features.  

See the [release notes](https://www.openvdb.org/documentation/doxygen/changes.html#v9_1_0_changes) for more details.

name: OpenVDB 8.2.0
body:
Highlights of this release:

- Added support for OpenEXR 3 and TBB 2021.

See the [release notes](https://academysoftwarefoundation.github.io/openvdb/changes.html#v8_2_0_changes) for more details.

name: OpenVDB 9.0.0
body:
Highlights of this release:
 - Official release of NanoVDB, which for the first time offers GPU support for static sparse volumes in OpenVDB.
 - Faster downstream build times from support for explicit template instantiation, which is enabled by default for most of the tools.
 - Added support for OpenEXR 3 and TBB 2021.
 - Added transient data to the RootNode, InternalNode, and LeafNode.

See the [release notes](https://academysoftwarefoundation.github.io/openvdb/changes.html#v9_0_0_changes) for more details.

name: OpenVDB 8.1.0
body: See the [release notes](https://academysoftwarefoundation.github.io/openvdb/changes.html#v8_1_0_changes) for more details.

name: OpenVDB 7.2.3
body:
This is a patch release to fix a performance regression in the DynamicNodeManager.

See the [release notes](https://academysoftwarefoundation.github.io/openvdb/changes.html#v7_2_3_changes) for more details.

name: OpenVDB 8.0.1
body:
This is a patch release:

* fixed a bug in the new CSG intersection merge algorithm
* various bug fixes and improvements

See the [release notes](https://academysoftwarefoundation.github.io/openvdb/changes.html#v8_0_1_changes) for more details.

name: OpenVDB 7.2.2
body:
This is a patch release:

* fixed a bug in the new CSG intersection merge algorithm
* fixed a few other minor bugs

See the [release notes](https://academysoftwarefoundation.github.io/openvdb/changes.html#v7_2_2_changes) for more details.

name: OpenVDB 8.0.0
body:
Highlights of this release:

* release of OpenVDB AX, an open source C++ library that provides a powerful and easy way of interacting with OpenVDB volume and point data
* ABI-breaking changes that improve performance and reduce memory usage
* various bug fixes and other improvements

See the [release notes](https://www.openvdb.org/documentation/doxygen/changes.html#v8_0_0_changes) for a complete list of changes.

name: OpenVDB 7.2.1
body:
This is a patch release:

* minor build fix for GCC 10+ compilers
* determinism bugfix in NodeManager

See the [release notes](https://www.openvdb.org/documentation/doxygen/changes.html#v7_2_1_changes) for more details.

name: OpenVDB 7.2.0
body:
Highlights of this release:
  
 * significant performance improvements to CSG operations with new parallel breath-first algorithms and tools
 * pre-release of OpenVDB AX, an open source C++ library that provides a powerful and easy way of interacting with OpenVDB volume and point data
 * added support for matrix grids
 * various bug fixes and other improvements

See the [release notes](https://www.openvdb.org/documentation/doxygen/changes.html#v7_2_0_changes) for a complete list of changes.

name: OpenVDB 7.1.0
body:
Highlights of this release:

* new fast sweeping methods that outperform existing techniques for computing signed distance fields in addition to supporting velocity extension
* various improvements and bug fixes to core library and Houdini toolkit
* removed dependency on boost mpl and boost thread
* improvements to the CMake build system

See the [release notes](https://www.openvdb.org/documentation/doxygen/changes.html#v7_1_0_changes) for a complete list of changes.

name: OpenVDB 3.3.0
body: This is the version of OpenVDB that ships with Houdini 16.0.  It is a custom version of OpenVDB 4.0.0 that is ABI-compatible with OpenVDB 3.
